name: g[squared]
description:
Founded 22 years ago, g[squared] is an Edmonton-based full-service marketing agency with the experience and expertise to deliver results. We’re very proud of what we do here at g[squared]. Our team of account managers, strategists, writers, designers and webmasters are all passionate about delivering dynamic, compelling work to our clients.
Saavy marketing strategies inform our creative work, and underlies every unique solution we devise to help our clients engage with their target markets in new and more meaningful ways. With over 200 years of combined experience, our team excels at delivering the right message in the right way at the right time.
READ MORE...
